instructions:
Apply meat tenderizer as per instructions. Combine spices and rub over ribs, then salt and pepper to taste.
Arrange ribs in single layer on a rack in a shallow baking pan. Add 1/4 cup of water to pan and roast in 425
F oven 30 minutes for medium rare. Turn ribs at least once. During last 10 minutes of roasting, baste with a
well stirred mixture of the liquid smoke and the vegetable oil. Serves 2.

For barbecued ribs, omit spices. Reduce oven to 375 F and brush with barbecue sauce for last 10 minutes
of roasting. Be careful and not allow barbecue sauce to burn.
name: Beef Ribs
